SEARCH
Package mk.musiclibraryweb.models

Class SongList

java.lang.Object
mk.musiclibraryweb.models.SongList
public class SongList extends Object
The SongList class manages a collection of Song objects, providing methods to add, delete, and retrieve songs.
Version:
5.0
Author:
Michal Kaminski

  • Constructor Details

    • SongList

      public SongList()

  • Method Details

    • addSong

      public void addSong(String songTitle, String authorName, String authorSurname, String songAlbum, String songRelease, String songTime) throws WrongInputException
      Adds a new song to the list after validating the input.
      Parameters:
      songTitle - The title of the song
      authorName - The composer's first name
      authorSurname - The composer's surname
      songAlbum - The album name the song belongs to
      songRelease - The release date of the song
      songTime - The duration of the song in seconds
      Throws:
      WrongInputException - if any input is invalid

    • compareSongTitles

      public void compareSongTitles(String songNewTitle, SongTitleChecker titleChecker) throws WrongInputException
      Checks if the specified title already exists among the current song titles in the list to ensure each song has a unique title. Utilizes a SongTitleChecker functional interface to compare titles. If a song with the same title is found, an exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      songNewTitle - The title of the song to be compared for uniqueness
      titleChecker - A functional interface to define the title comparison logic
      Throws:
      WrongInputException - if a song with the specified title already exists

    • getOneByIndex

      public Song getOneByIndex(int index)
      Retrieves a song by its index in the list.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the song to retrieve
      Returns:
      The Song object at the specified index

    • deleteOneByIndex

      public boolean deleteOneByIndex(int songID)
      Deletes a song by its index in the list.
      Parameters:
      songID - The index of the song to delete

    • getSongsArraySize

      public int getSongsArraySize()
      Retrieves the number of songs in the list.
      Returns:
      The size of the songs list

    • updateSong

      public boolean updateSong(int songID, Song song) throws WrongInputException
      Updates the song with the specified ID using the details of the given Song object. Validates the songID and the provided Song object to ensure all fields meet the required format and constraints. Throws exceptions for invalid inputs.
      Parameters:
      songID - the unique identifier of the song to update
      song - the Song object containing the new details
      Returns:
      true if the song with the specified ID exists and was updated, false otherwise
      Throws:
      WrongInputException - if: - songID is out of bounds, - any text field in the Song object is empty, - the release date is not in the format "dd.MM.yyyy", - the song time is not a positive number, - a song with the same title already exists (excluding the current song).
